amendment.description: An amendment numbered 57 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funds made available by this act from being used for the National Electric Vehicle Infrastructure Formula Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 238 (Roll no. 614).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 238 (Roll no. 614).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
